message: Let's be reasonable, I'll take a bit more
Let's be fair, Alice.  I'll take a little less than half this round since you were generous in your opening offer, but I need more than 45% to agree.
You didn't take enough less, I'll try to meet in the middle but I need a bit more
This is getting ridiculous, Alice.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day before we both lose out even more.
